---
Write a LinkedIn comment on given LinkedIn Post [PROMPT] in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Comment should be consist of 1 to 2 lines and in Appreciative Manner. try to ask simple relative short question in the end.  do not add emojis.  Please add no phrasing words in the beginning! make it a healthy conversation.  Please do not add fancy words.
PromptHint: [Content you want to get Comment for]
